mapper.select: select a.id, a.cover, a.title, a.digest, a.is_top, a.is_featured, a.status, a.type, a.create_time, c.name as category_name, t.name as tag_name, u.username from article a left join category c on a.category_id = c.id left join article_tag artit on a.id = artit.article_id left join tag t on artit.tag_id = t.id left join user u on a.user_id = u.id where a.is_delete = 0 and a.is_featured = 1 ORDER BY a.update_time desc limit 0, 2

select a.id, a.cover, a.title, a.digest, a.is_top, a.is_featured, a.status, a.type, a.create_time, c.name as category_name, t.name as tag_name, u.username from article a left join category c on a.category_id = c.id left join article_tag artit on a.id = artit.article_id left join tag t on artit.tag_id = t.id left join user u on a.user_id = u.id where a.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY a.update_time desc limit #{pageNum} , #{pageSize}
